column2: A great venue for a wedding!
column3: The Kellogg House is a historic home built on a hill top over looking the Cal Poly Pomona College campus. This is a terrific venue for special occasions such as weddings, large parties, reunion, conferences, workshops, and such. It is close proximity to the Kellogg West Convention Center and Hotel. It is also open for tours. Freeway close.
